entry.dcterms:description: census data (dwellings, families-households and individuals), comfort level and equipment in dwelling, its living area, number of rooms, composition of household, age composition of children, data of active and inactive members

housing
family life, marriage, relationship
person
census data
time-series
A randomly selected dwelling sample drawn from the 2% national representative sample of the 1990 census, which is representative of 2% of the individuals, flats, households and families.
